name: Sono Hanabira ni Kuchizuke o Google -  その花びらにくちづけを
description: Changes the style of the Google homepage into the greatest yuri visual novel series ever made :)
additional_info:
Tested with Windows 7 & Firefox 37.0.1 (1920x1080)

There may be problems with some domains, operating systems, browsers, resolutions etc.
I made this in one night without knowing much about css/html, so it can't be helped.
Feel free to edit it like you wish!

Yuri - the purest form of love <3
